item.title: Swype 3.25 Beta Pre-release Parse Error Solution
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: Swype just released their latest beta version 3.25 for Android phones but most of the folks are facing a “parse error” while trying to update to the latest version. If you are one of such folks, there is a simple solution that I just tried and got working. Instead of updating from the swype installer, you need to update manually. Uninstall your existing swype, then uninstall the existing swype installer on your phone.
